resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104088</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104088</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974019</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">NYC Preservation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">NYC Bewahrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conservation de NYC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Preservação de NYC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conservazione di NYC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συντήρηση NYC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Preservación de NYC</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This game will test your knowledge of New York City and its history. And you will play the role of a landmarks commissioner - and decide in five specific cases what is worth preserving for future generations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Spiel prüft Ihr Wissen von New York City 
und von seiner Geschichte. Und Sie spielen die Rolle eines 
Grenzsteinbeauftragten - und entscheiden in fünf spezifischen 
Fällen, was wertIST, für zukünftige Erzeugungen zu konservieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce jeu testera votre connaissance de New York City
et de son histoire. Et vous jouerez le rôle d'un commissaire de
bornes limites - et déciderez dans cinq cas spécifiques ce qui vaut 
la peine de préserver pour de futures générations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este jogo testará seu conhecimento de New York 
City e de seu history. E você jogará o papel de um comissário
dos marcos - e decidir-se-á em cinco casos específicos o que vale a 
pena preservar para as gerações futuras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo gioco verificherà la vostra conoscenza di 
New York City e della relativa storia. E svolgerete il ruolo di 
un commissario dei limiti - e deciderete in cinque casi specifici 
che cosa vale la pena di conservare per le generazioni future.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το παιχνίδι θα εξετάσει τη γνώση σας πόλης της 
Νέας Υόρκης και ιστορίας του. Και θα διαδραματίσετε το ρόλο
ενός Επιτρόπου ορόσημων - και θα αποφασίσετε σε πέντε 
συγκεκριμένες περιπτώσεις τι αξίζει για τις μελλοντικές γενεές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este juego probará su conocimiento de New York 
City y de su historia. Y usted desempeñará el papel de una 
comisión de las señales - y decidirá en cinco casos específicos 
qué vale el preservar para las generaciones futuras.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:GAIL ROBINSON, EDITOR-IN-CHIEF
FN:GAIL ROBINSON, EDITOR-IN-CHIEF
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974019</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104088</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/nyc-preservation</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
